DOC.brief_summary: A study designed to assess the efficacy, toleration and safety of SS-RBX for the treatment of stress urinary incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: An 8 Week Study Looking At The Efficacy, Toleration And Safety Of SS-RBX For Stress Urinary Incontinence.
DOC.criteria: Clinically significant stress urinary incontinence History or evidence of any relevant confounding urological or neurological disease
